src:
Četiri demonstranta i jedan policajac poginuli u sukobima u Bagdadu (VIDEO)

04 Nov 2019, 17:05

































Četiri demonstranta i jedan pripadnik bezbednosnih snaga poginuli su danas u sukobima u centru Bagdada gde su antivladini demonstranti prešli preko glavnog mosta i približili se vladinim zgradama, izjavili su irački zvaničnici.Jedan bezbednosni i jedan bolnički zvaničnik rekli su da je pored nastradalih 60 ljudi ranjeno u današnjim neredima.Desetine hiljada Iračana demonstrirali su poslednjih dana u centru Bagdada i u većinski šiitskim južnim delovima zemlje pozivajući na rušenje aktuelnog političkog sistema. Protesti su podstaknuti besom zbog rasprostranjene korupcije, visoke nezaposlenosti i loše javne službe.Bezbednosne snage ubile su više od 250 ljudi u dva naleta protesta od početka oktobra.Okršaji su danas izbili na trećem vodećem mostu u centralnom Bagdadu dok su bezbednosne snage pokušavale da spreče demonstrante da predju reku Tigar u pravcu Zelena zone, gde se nalazi sedište vlade.



Vidjene su desetine demonstranata kako trče ulicama, neki noseći ranjene ljude, uz zvuk pucnjave u pozadini. Demonstranti su gadjali policiju kamenjem, a policija je izvela na ulice oklopno vozilo sa vodenim topom.
text:
Four protesters and one policeman killed in clashes in Baghdad (VIDEO)

04 Nov 2019, 16:05

































Four protesters and one member of the security forces were killed today in clashes in downtown Baghdad, where anti-government protesters crossed the main bridge and approached government buildings, Iraqi officials said. Today's riots. Tens of thousands of Iraqis have demonstrated in recent days in central Baghdad and in most Shiite southern parts of the country, calling for the overthrow of the current political system. Protests are fueled by anger over widespread corruption, high unemployment and poor public service. Security forces have killed more than 250 people in two protests since early October. to cross the Tigar River in the direction of the Green Zone, where the seat of government is located.



Dozens of protesters were seen running through the streets, some carrying injured people, with the sound of gunshots in the background. Protesters were stoning the police, and police took an armored vehicle with a water cannon to the streets.
